messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Adele Faber books
messages.msgSnippet: Ahhh.  Farts happen! Robin B. ... How ... read
messages.messageBody:
Ahhh. Farts happen!

Robin B.


> I had a major brain fart!!! Her name jumped out at me because I have the
"How
> to talk so kids will listen" and some other books of hers and I haven't
read
> them in a long time...BUT I read an Adeles books recently and it was Adele
> CARRALL....duh.
> Sorry for the mislead.
> I guess I need to slow down. :)

messages.subject: Adele Faber books
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/12/03 3:28:52 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/12/03 3:28:52 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Ren, is this the same person I was talking about? The "How to Talk..."
book
author? I've had no problem at all finding her books in Canada. >>

I had a major brain fart!!! Her name jumped out at me because I have the "How
to talk so kids will listen" and some other books of hers and I haven't read
them in a long time...BUT I read an Adeles books recently and it was Adele
CARRALL....duh.
Sorry for the mislead.
I guess I need to slow down. :)

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Adele Faber books

> Well,.you're not going to find them just anywhere!! She self
published....an
> unschooling Mom in Australia.
> I have all three if you really want them. It's a lot about their school
> system,but much of it applies to anyone.

Ren, is this the same person I was talking about? The "How to Talk..." book
author? I've had no problem at all finding her books in Canada.

Robin B.

messages.subject: Adele Faber books
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/12/03 10:09:08 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/12/03 10:09:08 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
It was suggested to read Adelle Faber books. I need
someone to walk me thru this. How many books has she
written and which one should I read first? If I ever
heard of Adelle Faber it went in one ear and out the
other. >>

Well,.you're not going to find them just anywhere!! She self published....an
unschooling Mom in Australia.
I have all three if you really want them. It's a lot about their school
system,but much of it applies to anyone.
More based on school damage.
email me your address and you can have them.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
